name: Pet Quest!
description:
Leap into a grand adventure with Pet Quest! Explore a colorful and detailed open world, embark on a journey to discover and collect dozens of adorable pets, complete quests, discover keys and unlock new regions!

Features:
• 62 Pets to discover, collect & upgrade!
• Huge game map with 9 different regions to explore!
• Collect coins and open Eggs!
• Complete tons of quests!
• Grow your sanctuary!
